text: Micki Grant (born Minnie Perkins, June 30, 1941 â€“ August 22, 2021)Allen Woll, Dictionary of the Black Theatre, Greenwood Press, 1983, , p. 210. was an American singer, actress, playwright and composer. She performed in Having Our Say (as Sadie Delaney), Tambourines to Glory and Jericho-Jim Crow. She was nominated for a Tony Award three times. Grant was born in Chicago.
